info.name: 仪表盘管理API
info.description: 医疗行业仪表盘管理系统API接口集合，支持仪表盘CRUD、图表配置、数据源集成等功能

response.name: 成功响应
成功响应
response.body:
{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "获取成功",
  "data": {
    "id": "dashboard_001",
    "name": "医院运营仪表盘",
    "description": "医院日常运营数据分析",
    "status": "published",
    "type": "custom",
    "layout": "[{\"x\":0,\"y\":0,\"w\":6,\"h\":8,\"i\":\"chart_1\",\"chartConfig\":{\"type\":\"bar\",\"title\":\"患者统计\",\"dataSource\":{\"datasetId\":2,\"queryType\":\"single\",\"queryConfig\":{\"tableName\":\"patients\",\"dimensions\":[\"department\"],\"metrics\":[\"count\"]}}}}]",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T15:30:00Z",
    "createdBy": "user_123",
    "menuId": "menu_001"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "name": "新建医院运营仪表盘",
  "description": "用于监控医院日常运营指标",
  "layout": "[{\"x\":0,\"y\":0,\"w\":6,\"h\":8,\"i\":\"chart_1\",\"chartConfig\":{\"i\":\"chart_1\",\"id\":\"chart_1\",\"type\":\"bar\",\"title\":\"科室患者统计\",\"xField\":\"department\",\"yField\":\"patient_count\",\"showLegend\":true,\"showToolbox\":false,\"dataLimit\":100,\"dataSource\":{\"datasetId\":2,\"datasetName\":\"患者统计数据集\",\"queryType\":\"single\",\"queryConfig\":{\"tableName\":\"patients\",\"dimensions\":[\"department\"],\"metrics\":[\"COUNT(*) as patient_count\"],\"filters\":[],\"orderBy\":[{\"field\":\"patient_count\",\"direction\":\"desc\"}],\"limit\":20}}}},{\"x\":6,\"y\":0,\"w\":6,\"h\":8,\"i\":\"chart_2\",\"chartConfig\":{\"i\":\"chart_2\",\"id\":\"chart_2\",\"type\":\"pie\",\"title\":\"收入分布\",\"nameField\":\"department\",\"valueField\":\"total_revenue\",\"showLegend\":true,\"showToolbox\":false,\"dataLimit\":100,\"dataSource\":{\"datasetId\":3,\"datasetName\":\"收入统计数据集\",\"queryType\":\"multi\",\"queryConfig\":{\"mainTable\":\"billing\",\"joins\":[{\"table\":\"departments\",\"type\":\"LEFT\",\"condition\":\"billing.department_id = departments.id\"}],\"dimensions\":[\"departments.name as department\"],\"metrics\":[\"SUM(billing.amount) as total_revenue\"],\"groupBy\":[\"departments.name\"],\"orderBy\":[{\"field\":\"total_revenue\",\"direction\":\"desc\"}],\"limit\":10}}}}]",
  "status": "draft",
  "type": "custom",
  "menuId": "menu_001"
}
